Posts.Content: Jul 2, 2008 12:34PM lilwebb wrote: The worst for me is that anyone who sees my picture on my care page tells me how great I look bald. Honestly, do they think that makes me feel better? I know everyone is just trying to be nice, but get real!
Posts.Title: What I hate MOST about being bald! HeatherBLocklear dhettish

Posts.Content: May 18, 2008 07:26PM lilwebb wrote: Hi Lenny, Â I was feeling "normal" and able to return to work 5 days after my 1st T/C treatment. My 1st tx was on May 9th, returned to work May 15th, worked for 6hrs and then a full day on Friday. I know it feels like hell for a few days, but you will feel better! I am getting only 3 more treatments, every three weeks. I would find out exactly why you are getting 6. Seems like you barely have enough time to recouperate in between! Good luck and god bless and know you are not alone in your fight! We will be right here helping you along. Take care, Kim
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo May 2008 KristyAnn Nico1012
